text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo This day will go down in history as ignorant corrupt Donald Trump and his ignorant corrupt Republican with no hearts are wishing mothers a happy Mother's Day as mothers around the world are dying from covid-19
